name: I Have All The Answers, Hope You Do Too Quiz  | 10 Questions

questions.text: All of these singers were born in New York, except?
questions.explanation:
Paul Simon.

	Simon was born on November 5, 1942 in Newark, New Jersey.

questions.text: The motto, 'In God We Trust', originated during which war?
questions.explanation:
The Civil War.

	It wasn't designated as the U.S. National Motto by Congress until 1956.

questions.text: Who said the following, 'At 50, everyone has the face he deserves'?
questions.explanation:
George Orwell.

	George Orwell, born in India, was the English author best known for his books 'Animal Farm' and '1984'.

questions.text: All of these countries have flags of red, white and blue except?
questions.explanation:
Greece.

	Greece's flag has just white and blue.

questions.text: Marlon Brando was in all of these movies except?
questions.explanation:
The Visitor.

	The Visitor was an 'Omen' rip-off with Glenn Ford and John Huston.

questions.text: 'The doctors x-rayed my head and found nothing'. Who uttered these words of wisdom?
questions.explanation:
Dizzy Dean.

	Dizzy was explaining how he felt after being hit on the head by a ball in the 1934 World Series.

questions.text: Who sang the theme song to the television show, 'The Courtship of Eddie's Father'?
questions.explanation:
Harry Nilsson.

	Nilsson also did the music score for the offbeat and rarely seen Otto Preminger movie, 'Skidoo'.

questions.text: All of the following men were signers of the Declaration of Independence except?
questions.explanation:
Martin Van Buren.

	Martin Van Buren was the eighth president of the U.S. but not a signer of the famous document.

questions.text: In what city was the Olympics of 1928 held?
questions.explanation:
Amsterdam, Netherlands.

	The others were Antwerp, Belgium in 1920, Rome, Italy in 1960 and St. Louis, U.S.A. in 1904.

questions.text: Which rock and roller was born on December 18, 1943 in Dartford, Kent, England?
questions.explanation:
Keith Richards.

	Keith Richards is known for his ageless music and complexion.
